Body: A modern solution that simplifies your financial management.

Header: Track Your Income and Expenses Easily!
Body: You can track your daily expenses and income.
You can keep your spending under control by setting a monthly limit.

Header: Save Money and Achieve Your Goals!
Body: How much should you set aside to save 10,000 TL per month?
You can view graphs of data such as income-expenditure balance, spending habits.
Targets for economic developments can be added.
If you want more information about the app, you can use the Help/Support tab.
